messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Police involved in an accident at I-83 northbound, near the Pepsi sign.
Can you clarify the location?
I-83 northbound at the Pepsi sign, near Union Avenue.
Are there any injuries reported?
Yes, it looks like there are injuries. Someone might have fallen over a bridge.
Understood. We have units responding. What's your current location?
I'm near the intersection of 1650 Union Avenue and the I-83 northbound exit.
Are the injured parties accessible, or do we need special equipment to reach them?
One person is inside the Pepsi plant. They fell off the bridge.
Alright, we will send a medic to the Pepsi plant. Please stay on the line for further instructions.
There are also two injured on I-83 northbound.
Copy that. Additional ambulances are on the way. Please ensure the area is safe for emergency responders.
Understood. We are blocking off streets to make way for the ambulances.
Good. Please guide the medics to the lower parking lot of the Pepsi plant.
Will do. I'm shutting down the southbound side of 83 to one lane.
Medics are en route. Are the injured parties conscious?
Yes, one person is conscious but needs medical attention immediately.
Understood. Medics are less than 5 minutes away. Ensure your team is ready to assist them upon arrival.
Copy that. We're coordinating everything on our end.
